channel.title: Enable one to download tables in public dashboard?
channel.description: It is great to have the option to share the dashboard with others, however, there are no options to download the table in public dashboard. I wonder if it is possible to enable one to download the tables in the public dashboard in near future?

item.title: Enable one to download tables in public dashboard?
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
Negative

We’re very open to including this in the official version if someone opens a pull request for it.

Currently the workaround is to share excel or csv download links across the org. Which isn’t ideal and doesn’t work if a query uses parameters.

Read full topic
item.source: Enable one to download tables in public dashboard?

item.title: Enable one to download tables in public dashboard?
item.dc:creator: etadelta222
item.description:
@jesse , did this make it on any future releases?

item.source: Enable one to download tables in public dashboard?

item.title: Enable one to download tables in public dashboard?
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
This has been mentioned several times in the past few months on the forum:

Download data from public Dashboard Support
Hi, I am using Redash v4.0.1+b4038 Is there a possibility to have download functionality for public Dashboard ? Once they see the data I don’t see the reason why not to be able to download it. Copy-Paste is always an option, but inappropriate one. Thanks
V8 Public query params and download csv Support
I know that in V7 I can’t use parameterized queries on public dashboards. So I updated to V8. In V8 I can use it on public dashboards and public querys sucessfully. The problem Is that there are no button for download as csv when I use parameterized queries and make it public. Maybe with an example will be better. Both images are on V8. Two public querys inside an iframe. Both on same redash instance and same code for embed [PublicQueryIframeWithoutParams] On this query, We can download the …

It’s on the radar for a future release.

Read full topic
